labels: Bible verse random mobile phone phones j2me java
name: Bible random verse for mobile phones
short_description: Bible random verse for mobile phone phones which are java j2me enabled is application which finds random verse from selected interval (eg. Matthew - Revelation), show verse text and after clicking next shows where the text is written (eg. John 1,7) and so on, with clicking next new verse shows. All New Testament is included of KJV.
